summary_short: Rodion Raskolnikov is the most connected figure (21 ties).
highlights: Most central: Rodion Raskolnikov (21), Dmitri Prokofich Razumihin (16), Avdotya Romanovna (12), Pyotr Petrovich Luzhin (10)
story_summary: Raskolnikov is bewildered by the unexpected visit from Svidrigailov, who expresses interest in meeting him and seeks his support regarding Raskolnikov's sister, Dunya. Svidrigailov discusses his past with Dunya and his late wife, Marfa Petrovna, while Raskolnikov remains hostile and dismissive. The conversation reveals Svidrigailov's complex nature, as he reflects on his actions and the consequences of his relationships.
